Context.Description: Actor creates, modifies, or deletes Users.

Preconditions.Description: Actor is logged on and identified by a User.

Trigger.Description: Actor indicates wish to configure Users.

Guarantees.Success: A User is create, modified, or deleted.

MainSteps.Step: Actor indicates wish to create a User.
System verifies the login and name are unique.
System creates a User as specified, and confirms the creation to the actor.

Extension.Description: Actor indicates wish to modify a User
Extension.Step: System presents a list of the existing Users.
System presents the details of the selected User.
System verifies the login and name are unique.

Extension.Description: The login or name is not unique
Extension.Step: System informs the actor that the login or name is already in use. Processing continues at step 1a4.
System modifies the User as specified, and confirms the modification to the actor.

Extension.Description: Actor indicates wish to delete a User
Extension.Step: System presents a list of the existing Users.
System prompts for confirmation of deletion.
System deletes the User, and confirms deletion to actor.

Extension.Description: The login or name is not unique
Extension.Step: System informs the actor that the login or name is already in use. Processing continues at step 3.
